about_the_game:
Welcome Back to Project 13!
Get ready for the thrilling sequel that redefines perception tests! You'll embark on a captivating test where sitting still and pressing buttons become the ultimate test of your observational skills. Your mission: spot and report anomalies 13 times in a row to survive the test.

Gameplay
Take a seat in the Observation Chair, and prepare to engage in a game like no other. The gate before you opens, revealing a series of scenes. Your task is simple but challenging: identify and report every anomaly you see. Each successful report brings you closer to mastering the test. But your Timebudget keeps you in check, so don’t think too long… Will you have the patience and keen eye needed to spot them all?

Sit & Observe: Sit in the Observation Chair as the gate opens, presenting you with various scenes.
Spot the Anomalies: Keep your eyes peeled for anything out of the ordinary. It could be a subtle change or a glaring oddity.
Report Accurately: Press the button to report anomalies. You need to report if there was an anomaly or not.
Beat the Challenge: Successfully report anomalies 13 times in a row to conquer the game.

Features



Immersive Scenes: Experience a wide range of meticulously crafted scenes designed to test your perception.
Challenging Anomalies: Each anomaly is uniquely crafted to challenge your observation skills. Some are easy to spot, while others require a sharp eye and attention to detail.
Progressive Difficulty: As you progress, the anomalies become trickier, pushing your skills to the limit.
Relaxing yet Engaging: Enjoy a game that blends relaxation with intense focus. Perfect for unwinding while keeping your mind sharp.
Just don’t mind the guy behind the curtains...

Are You Ready?
Do you have what it takes to conquer Project 13: Perception Test? Sit back, "relax," and let your eyes do the work. How many anomalies can you spot?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 x64
  • Processor: Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
